name: I'M DESPERATE TO KILL THIS BEEZ
name_original: I'M DESPERATE TO KILL THIS BEEZ
description:
YOU DON’T NEED REASONS TO SLAUGHTER EVERY BEEZSZ!

BUT BE CAREFUL BIZURNURZ, THERE’S A PRICE FOR EVERY MURDER !

"I don't see any bug in our game, only artistic decisions." - The Saltiest CORP"

Here the first game of The Saltiest ! That was basically our first time on Unity and our first Game-jam, and our first game...

HOW TO PLAY :

  • WAD TO MOVE
  • RIGHT CLICK TO ATTACK
  • LEFT CLICK TO DASH
